name: WTF Wars - Rhythm Edition - A musical game for GDevelop
name_original: WTF Wars - Rhythm Edition - A musical game for GDevelop
description:
WTF Wars - Rhythm Edition - A musical game for GDevelop

Just follow the arrows and try to match the perfect timing.

Controls:

AWSD for player 1

LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN for player 2

Mouse and Enter for start the game

R - Restart the game anytime
